00045     struct IndexStatus {
00046       enum action_code {
00047         FileOpen,
00048         FileSkip,
00049         FileError,
00050         FileClose,
00051         DocumentCount
00052       };
00053 
00054       virtual void operator () ( int code, const std::string& documentPath, const std::string& error, int documentsIndexed, int documentsSeen ) {
00055         status( code, documentPath, error, documentsIndexed, documentsSeen );
00056       }
00057 
00058       virtual void status( int code, const std::string& documentPath, const std::string& error, int documentsIndexed, int documentsSeen ) {};
00059     };
